source.45a69a75:
fig, axes = plt.subplots(nrows=3, ncols=1, figsize=(18,30))
for i in range(len(numericals)):
    col = numericals[i]
    sns.histplot(x=col, data=data, color="mediumspringgreen", ax=axes[i])
    letitre = f"{col}\n Missing: {missing[col]}, Mean: {data[col].mean(): .2f}, Median: {data[col].median(): .2f}"
    axes[i].set_title(letitre, fontsize=25)
    axes[i].set_xlabel(None)
plt.show()
source.f9ee2635:
for col in numericals:
    data[col].fillna( data[col].mean(), inplace=True)
source.b2871d88:
fig, axes = plt.subplots(nrows=5, ncols=1, figsize=(18,50))
for i in range(len(categoricals)):
    col = categoricals[i]
    sns.countplot(x=col, data=data, color="plum", ax=axes[i])
    letitre = f"{col}\n Missing: {missing[col]}"
    axes[i].set_title(letitre, fontsize=25)
    axes[i].set_xlabel(None)
plt.show()
source.74678fa8:
for col in categoricals:
    data[col].fillna(data[col].mode()[0], inplace=True)
